output_list.reason: Allows unlimited token minting without constraints, disrupting supply-demand balance.
Allows the owner to burn tokens, which can lead to token devaluation and financial losses for holders.
Missing access control checks allow transfers to restricted addresses, which can lead to unauthorized transfers and financial losses.
Missing access control checks allow approvals to any spender, which can lead to unauthorized spending and financial losses.
Missing access control checks allow transfers from any sender, which can lead to unauthorized transfers and financial losses.
